page.title: 03POST OFFICE WALL-U-HEYWOOD
page.content:
Measures 5m by 4m. Open daily except Sunday from {9 {a.m. to 4.30 p.m.}
The postmaster has been there for 10 years and has had no strikes.
Before opening,he must check the date stamp and money and prepare returns. He has to get up 8 a.m.
About {20 letters a day }are posted and sent to the sorting office at Church Stretton. From there they go anywhere in the world.
{Other services}offered are pensions, family allowance, T.V _ licences, telephone accounts, saving stamps and registered mail.
